alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 08 at 11:09AM PST until December 08 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of one to three inches expected. Storm total of 2 to 6 inches expected. * WHERE...In Oregon, Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Oregon. In Washington, Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Accumulating snow expected primarily west of The Dalles.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Oregon
